text: David Kai Lennart Sundin, (born 23 May, 1976) is a Swedish television presenter and comedian. ==Biography== Sundin grew up in Gimo in Uppland. He started working within comedy as part of the Killinggängets site Spermaharen. He also worked along with Alex Schulman and his website "1000 Apor". In 2012, he published the book Fantasinyheter 2001–2012, Henrik Schyffert also wrote a few sections of the book. He has also done some work as a producer for segments for the television shows Sen kväll med Luuk on TV4 and Roast på Berns on Kanal5, he wrote some of the manuscript for Melodifestivalen and Welcome to Sweden. He has presented the athletics gala Idrottsgalan and the SVT show Bäst i test. Retrieved 3 September 2019 In 2013, he started doing standup and has performed at the clubs RAW, Norra Brunn and Stockholm Comedy Club.Lördag 1 februari - Raw på Hilton rawcomedy.se Retrieved 3 September 2019 In 2015, Sundin was nominated for an Kristallen award for his work in the comedy series Inte OK on TV3. Retrieved 3 September 2019 Sundin plays "Dynamit-Harry" in Tomas Alfredsons film Se upp för Jönssonligan. On 3 September 2019, Sundin was announced as a presenter of Melodifestivalen 2020 along with Lina Hedlund and Linnea Henriksson. Retrieved 3 September 2019 == Bibliography == *Fantasinyheter 2001-2012, *Spermaharen, *Sveriges Bästa Ordvitsar, *Två nötcreme och en Moviebox, (Illustrator) ==References== ==External links== Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Swedish television hosts Category:Melodifestivalen presenters
title: David Sundin
